mapper.select: select t1.id as "id" ,t1.acti_type as "actiType" ,t1.acti_name as "actiName" ,date_format(t1.acti_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "actiStartTime" ,date_format(t1.acti_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "actiEndTime" ,date_format(t1.apply_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "applyStartTime" ,date_format(t1.apply_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "applyEndTime" ,date_format(t1.mes_send_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "mesSendTime" ,t1.acti_address as "actiAddress" ,t1.acti_cost as "actiCost" ,t1.acti_organizer as "actiOrganizer" ,t1.acti_number as "actiNumber" ,t1.acti_poster_url as "actiPosterUrl" ,t1.acti_views as "actiViews" ,t1.acti_like as "actiLike" ,t1.acti_order as "actiOrder" ,t1.apply_num as "applyNum" ,t1.partic_num as "particNum" ,t1.acti_status as "actiStatus" ,date_format(t1.created_time , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,date_format(t1.issue_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "issueTime" ,t1.issue_account as "issueAccount" ,date_format(t1.modified_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "modifiedTime" ,t1.modifier_account as "modifierAccount" ,t1.is_index as "isIndex" ,t1.is_apply as "isApply" ,t1.park_id as "parkId" ,co.code_name as "parkName" ,t1.show_apply_num as "showApplyNum" ,t1.apply_check as "applyCheck" ,t2.acti_detail as "actiDetail" from tb_activity t1 left join tb_park_code co on co.id = t1.park_id left join tb_activity_detail t2 on t1.id=t2.activity_id where t1.id=#{id} and t1.record_status != '0'

select t1.id as "id" ,t1.activity_id as "activityId" ,t1.creator_account as "account" ,date_format(t1.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,t1.apply_status as "applyStatus" ,t1.sign_status as "signStatus" ,date_format(t1.sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "signTime" ,t1.sign_type as "signType" from tb_activity_apply t1 where 1=1 and t1.activity_id=#{activityId} and t1.creator_account=#{account} and t1.apply_status='1'
